title: HTML+CSS Level 1 — Basic HTML Structure
concept: HTML boilerplate, headings, paragraphs, line breaks and basic text formatting.

challenges.title: Hello Web Page
challenges.description: Create a minimal HTML page that shows a big heading saying "Hello, World!" and a short paragraph below it saying "This is my first web page."
challenges.outputDescription: A page with an H1 heading and a paragraph below it.
examples:
Page shows:
Heading: Hello, World!
Paragraph: This is my first web page.
challenges.starterCode:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <title>Hello Web Page</title>
</head>
<body>
  <!-- Add your heading and paragraph here -->
</body>
</html>

challenges.title: Simple Links Page
challenges.description: Create a heading "Useful Links" and an unordered list where each item is a clickable link (<a>) to some website (Google, YouTube, etc.).
challenges.outputDescription: A heading and a list of clickable links.
